text: Ri Yong-mu (25 January 1925 â€“ 27 January 2022) was a North Korean senior official. He was a member of the Politburo of the Workers' Party of Korea. He was vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of North Korea and vice- marshal of the Korean People's Army. Ri died from a heart attack on 27 January 2022, two days after his 97th birthday. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:North Korean politicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Ri Yong-mu
